body:
Like many Minecrafters you  guys probably have a hard time getting chicks to like you, that's why I created this easy step by step guide to help you get the cutest chick!

Be Confident

Confidence is important, it shows strength and insures you won't back down.

Be Well Groomed

This might be hard for basement dwellers like you all, but you should make an effort. Chicks don't dig the smell.

Be Quick

You don't want the chick to get picked up by another guy first do you? Don't hesitate when you see an opportunity take it!

Don't be creepy

No chick likes the guy that walks slowly 10 feet behind them that's just scary.


Now you're ready to try it! Please click here to see what it will likely look like if you've been sucessful. Good luck!
